name: INFINITI VR
description: Immersive VR experience for HTC Vive featuring world leading visuals and interactions. Check it out for free now.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Processor: 32 or 64 bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 32 or 64 bit Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or equivalent Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: SSD recommended
